name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Digital detox: Website Timer and Blocker

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows users to time their use of certain websites and block them when the timer is up.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Key Features:
Usage Timer & Automatic Blocking
Digital Detox keeps track of your website usage. Once your time is up, it automatically blocks the flagged sites, gently reminding you to take a break and focus on the world beyond the screen.

Focus Mode
Need laser like focus?, Focus Mode allows access only to whitelisted websites essential for your tasks. Say goodbye to distractions and hello to heightened productivity.

Category-Based Blocking
Take control of your online habits by blocking entire categories of websites. Whether it's social media, or entertainment, Digital Detox lets you customize your experience by filtering content based on your priorities.

Keyword-Based Blocking
Digital Detox empowers you to create a healthier online environment by flagging specific keywords in URLs. If a site contains these keywords, access is automatically denied, ensuring you stay away from triggering content.

Custom Block Page
With Digital Detox, you can create your custom block page, reminding you why you chose to detox in the first place. Personalize it with motivational quotes, images, or personal messages to reinforce your commitment to a balanced digital lifestyle.
